name: 2025 The 11th International Conference on Frontiers of Educational Technologies
content: Proceedings: The accepted papers after peer-review will be published with Lecture Notes in Educational Technology (Electronic ISSN: 2196-4971|Print ISSN: 2196-4963) which will be indexed by SCOPUS; ACM Digital Library; ERIC; INSPEC; Norwegian Register for Scientific Journals and Series; SCImago, etc.
